title: The Blessing of Odin - Novel Updates
author: Jun Zi Yi Ze   Tian Lai Zhi Yuan   君子以泽   天籁纸鸢
description: The Blessing of Odin is a full-length religious love myth. The novel takes Iceland’s epic Edda and North Europe myths as the background to build the myth world view set in nine worlds and six races. The story tells the love triangle among Odin, the King of the Gods, Frigga, the Queen and the Goddess of Love, and Loki, the God of Fire.>
